lender.name: Bill, KF6 Uganda
lender.loan_because: I believe that market-based solutions hold the greatest potential for solving our most critical social problems. I'm honored to assist deserving individuals who are working hard to move out of poverty and restore the hope that with hard work, persistence and access to necessary resources, tomorrow holds greater promise than today. With Kiva, lending is easy, fun and interesting! And best of all my contribution is used time and again with multiple borrowers across the globe - truly a multiplier effect.
lender.occupational_info: How energy is sourced, refined, distributed and used is one of the critical issues of our time. Energy connects all aspects of human and non-human life. As a life long environmentalist with an MBA, helping our country move from environmentally-degrading sources of energy to clean, sustainable sources allows me to align my profession with my values. I develop large projects in both the public and private sectors.

lender.name: Billy & Angela
lender.loan_because: 1. We are able to. 2. We had the opportunity to see first hand how much these loans can help while serving in the Peace Corps.

lender.name: Maureen
lender.loan_because:
Everyone deserves the chance to be self sufficient and I believe that small business entrepreneurs are the wave of the future.
It is an HONOR to be able to be given the opportunity to support these entrepreneurs.

lender.name: stacia
lender.loan_because: I like to help people who are trying to better their situation.

lender.name: Christina
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the world.

lender.name: Jeanna
lender.loan_because: Because ,I believe that we are the body of Christ ,and as the body.Our arms should be reaching,our hands should be healing,Our feet should be going.His Love should be showing.We are many members but one body.Jesus is the way the truth and the life.
lender.occupational_info: I am just like you.I could be your daughter,your sister,your mother. Your friend.Your sister in Christ.I am just like you.Some of things that make you laugh,Make me laugh to.When I hurt I cry.I feel joy just like you.I am just like you.My job is to make your day just a little bit more joyful,as you have made mine,in the act of giving.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I believe that people who are trying hard to make their lives better should have a reliable opportunity to be successful.
lender.occupational_info: I teach history to 13, 14, and 15-year-old students.

lender.name: Marnie
lender.loan_because: Because I would want someone to do it for me or my daughter.
lender.occupational_info: Train and consult with Architects, Engineers and Contractors on Project Management solutions.

lender.name: Sergio HBO
lender.loan_because: I feel good. The Kiva's idea is fantastic!
lender.occupational_info: Try again and again.

lender.name: Nickie
lender.loan_because: People have loaned to me when I was in need.
lender.occupational_info: I care for my disabled brother. I balance my stress with my art. photography and glass making. I like to travel and this also give me balance. Blessings to you and your dreams.

lender.name: keerthi
lender.loan_because: i want to make a difference however small that might be. I believe in expanding the humanity and that we all can be friends in this world of growing conflicts.

lender.name: Babson Microfunds
lender.loan_because: We believe in entrepreneurship and the power of finance to create globally positive change.
lender.occupational_info: We are dedicated to the progression of humanity and entrepreneurship.

lender.name: HEATHER and STEVE
lender.loan_because: Its what we all should do...HELP!

lender.name: Christopher
lender.occupational_info: I help working people build political power so that we can have a more just and equitable society.

lender.name: Charlie
lender.loan_because: A little money can go a long way in helping others acheive their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I work with International Programs. People from all over the world come to UC Davis to take courses in International Law.

lender.name: Florian
lender.loan_because: I hope it helps.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I've been blessed with so much and just maybe my little effort will make a difference to some one else's life.

lender.name: LHS Tigers
lender.loan_because: We learned about poverty and microloans in class and our club. Groups raised money to donate to our account, and we are going to keep adding for new loans!
lender.occupational_info: We are a group of students who maintain our kiva.org account. In addition to making loans, we raise money a couple times a year and also do community service projects.

lender.name: Lynn
lender.loan_because: it works

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: Kiva allows the free flow of "support" from one source to another, without having to play the bureaucratic banking game. I am truly grateful for the opportunity to give to someone else who has a desire to challenge their life, and do something someone else might tell them is not possible.

lender.name: Kari
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a helping had as they reach for their dreams
lender.occupational_info: I talk to college students and help them prepare to prepare for getting jobs in public service after they graduate

lender.name: Irene Duda
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping other people
lender.occupational_info: I sell real estate property

lender.name: Chan
lender.loan_because: I think it is a right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a college, helping teachers learn how to teach more effectively.

lender.name: The Jeffries Family
lender.loan_because: we watched a documentary about micro loans and we thought this would be a great way for our kids connect with other parts of the world.

lender.name: William
lender.loan_because: I believe that Kiva is a responsible organization that will greatly assist our world community.

lender.name: Arlene
lender.loan_because: Helping others is a big part of who I am.
lender.occupational_info: Help people to buy and sell their homes in Palm Harbor where I live and all over the area of Tampa Bay Florida.

lender.name: Becka
lender.occupational_info: I help people find information and good books to read.

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because: I believe in empowering people.
lender.occupational_info: Write a Web site for an airport in the United States.

lender.name: Wu Rui-Liang
lender.loan_because:
I would prefer that the current monetary system is changed to, ala for example, LETS
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Local_Exchange_Trading_Systems
or Swiss WIR system
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/WIR_Bank
or other alternatives described in one of the books of Bernard Litaer:
http://www.transaction.net/money/book/
so there is a balance between production and consumption by every individual and every country, and money is used solely as an exchange medium in economy and not as a way for accumulating wealth or practicing greediness. Before that happens micro credit is the closest thing to that goal.
I also do this as a tribute to my mother (the one on the photo) who passed away in 2007. She always liked to help people who in needs. I hope she would be happy that I do the same like she did.

lender.name: Nichole
lender.loan_because: I am thankful for what I have, and want to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I help a retail company with their computer systems.

lender.name: Marek
lender.loan_because: I want to help
lender.occupational_info: I study engineering and work part-time as a web developer

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I want to help people succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I install and maintain computer networks for small business in Tucson, Arizona, USA.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: "It is more blessed to give than to receive."
lender.occupational_info: I help people buy and sell homes.

lender.name: Liza
lender.loan_because: Microlending provides empowerment--isn't that something we all need? I also want to feel like I am helping better this world.

lender.name: Erwin & Laura
lender.occupation: VLM Crew Rosterer & Flowserve Vendor Coordinator
lender.loan_because: This is the perfect way to help people building up there own life and future. With just that little help from our side we just hope we can make the world a little better.
lender.occupational_info: Erwin is Cabin Crew Rosterer for Cityjet/VLM Airlines and Laura is working as Project Vendor Coordinator at Flowserve Netherlands.

lender.name: Carmen
lender.loan_because: I hope to help someone.
lender.occupational_info: I am a lawyer's assistant and do all sorts of legal work.

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: I am abundantly blessed by God and have more than I need.
lender.occupational_info: I am a stay-at-home, homeschooling mother of two children, ages 11 and 8. My husband owns an excavation business. We live on a cattle ranch in beautiful Arkansas.

lender.name: Economic Eagles
lender.loan_because: Our economics class studied the topic of microcredit as a development strategy and we wanted to support this approach.
lender.occupational_info: We are part of an international school in Chile and in our class we study the basics of economics as well as international economics and development

lender.name: ivana e lorenza
lender.loan_because: we loan because we believe in empowering people. We think Kiva is an easy and wonderful way to give people a hand up.

lender.name: Hildegard
lender.loan_because: this is my small help to help people themselves to better their lives and families.

lender.name: Lori
lender.loan_because: I need to start giving more and taking less from the world.
lender.occupational_info: I want to help people who are trying to better their lives. We all should!

lender.name: colacci
lender.loan_because: deseo un prestamo para empezar un negocio en el mercado de mi barrio disculpen que no se ingles espero les llegue y me respondan sastifactoriamente
lender.occupational_info: soy modista de profesion y deseo poner un puesto en el mercado de mi barrio de costura y venta de bodega

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I won the "birth lottery" by being born in a wealthy country. I'd like to share some of my winnings.
lender.occupational_info: I help to provide oral care products (toothpaste, toothbrushes, dental floss, mouthwash, etc.) to people in Canada.

lender.name: darcy
lender.loan_because: my small donation can change the world for someone who is working to be independant.
lender.occupational_info: I sell web based advertising programs to small/medium size businesses to help them grow

lender.name: Dawn
lender.loan_because: I want other business owners to succeed and be prosperous
lender.occupational_info: Artist and therapy

lender.name: Gilbert
lender.loan_because: It helps the world.
lender.occupational_info: Computer systems

lender.name: Steven & Christy
lender.loan_because: our travels around the world have shown us the importance of helping others.
lender.occupational_info: Companies hire us for a defined period of time to help them solve business problems that are hindering their ability to grow.

lender.name: Belinda
lender.loan_because: We can all change the world one loan at a time.

lender.name: kelley
lender.occupational_info: seamstress

lender.name: Ramya
lender.loan_because: I want to participate in spreading the universe of possibilities to as many people as I can.

lender.name: Espaa
lender.loan_because: I've had it pretty good and can finally afford to give something back.

lender.name: Yoav
lender.loan_because: I want to help people.
lender.occupational_info: See http://www.yoavshapira.com for details.

lender.name: Patrick
lender.loan_because: I love the concept of micro lending. Traveled to Mali a few years ago and wanted to contribute in a positive way to the wonderful people there.

lender.name: Mary Beth & Josh
lender.loan_because: I care.
lender.occupational_info: MB sells clothing to the stores for the manufactuers and is a personal stylist. Josh records bands and makes music.

lender.name: Maria Adelaide
lender.loan_because: I like to help people who work hard to improve their lives

lender.name: Nicholas
lender.loan_because: I love giving back to our world.
lender.occupational_info: I am learning at a school

lender.name: Matt
lender.loan_because: Other people need my money more than I do. This is an easy way to perform 'economic stimulus' for someone else's economy that really needs it. My family believes that practicing social justice is the best way to follow Jesus' teachings and put our faith into practice.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a state-sponsored university in a high mountain town in Montana, USA. My job is managing computer systems to help the educational and research missions of our institution.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I enjoy making a difference where it is needed.

lender.name: Carlo and Diane
lender.loan_because: We have everything we could ever want or need in this life. To help someone take a step which makes a huge difference in their life, and those around them is priceless. Just think for a moment how easily we spend $25 for something frivolous. Many hands(or wallets) make light work.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: I really believe that there are a lot of small entrepreneurs that could do great if they were given a small chance. But because of their current life situation, they are kept in poverty. So I am so pleased that Kiva gives a mean to help these people.
lender.occupational_info: The IB is a leader in international education and engenders programmes to develop the intellectual, personal, emotional and social skills to live, learn and work in a rapidly globalizing world

lender.name: Coulsen
lender.loan_because: I like to help people that need a helping hand . I think that Kiva has given me a fun way to give to people I don't know.

lender.name: John & Phyllis
lender.loan_because: My family wants to share the love of God in a very practical way.

lender.name: The Fisher Family
lender.loan_because: Our family has been blessed beyond measure. Having traveled to Guatemala and Russia - we have developed such a heart for missions and by partnering with Kiva - it allows us to feel like we are serving on the mission field everyday.

lender.name: Cindy
lender.loan_because: My mom used to own a store when I was a kid, and it was difficult for her at times, so I wanted to help someone with her store.
lender.occupational_info: I'm in Sales in a global corporation. I help to write proposals and coordinate projects and meetings.

lender.name: Souriya
lender.loan_because: I hope to encourage that there is hope.
lender.occupational_info: graduate school, industrial engineer

lender.name: Valerie
lender.loan_because: sharing is important. I am where I am because of the support of others.
lender.occupational_info: Helping people find the agricultural information they need.

lender.name: jc lee
lender.loan_because: I want to. I know how important it is for these entrepreneurs to have the opportunity to make their dreams come through so they can build a better future for themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I am working on quite a few projects, but photography is my passion and I spend a great deal of time on it. I admire works of Dorothea Lange, a photographer famous for her work during the Great Depression, Mother Teresa and Mdecins Sans Frontires. I am still learning the art of photography and hope one day I will be good enough to be able to share more of the revenues generated from my photo sales with these entrepreneurs.

lender.name: Alexis
lender.loan_because: I want to help those in need around the world, one small step at a time. It is a wonderful thing to see my contribution being transformed into a productive, life-changing event for someone in another country.
lender.occupational_info: I hire volunteers to find host families for teenage foreign exchange students coming the United States.

lender.name: Thyagu
lender.loan_because: as a saying in an indian language goes "small droplets lead to big floods"

lender.name: Pascal
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference and help people in development country to have access to the necessary fund they need to improve life in their communities.
lender.occupational_info: I'm about to start a new career and a new work in management consulting. I'll try to work hard and get a valuable experience. In the middle or long term, I'll like to work for an international organization like the UN to help developing countries and make a difference.

lender.name: Keri
lender.loan_because: I believe it is important to support entrepreneurs and their dreams.

lender.name: julie
lender.loan_because: I was on an airplane and stumbled across an article on Kiva. I was amazed with the concept and couldn't think of a reason not to be involved.
lender.occupational_info: I document and service real estate loans to companies that are building shopping centers and office buildings.

lender.name: Armengol
lender.loan_because: I was viewing a show a P.B.S called Frontline/World. The show was about the Kiva foundation I thought it was a wonderful idea. I loan because I want to change lives and whom ever life I do change thank you for changing my life as well. I BELIEVE
lender.occupational_info: Work a friend of mine who owns transportation and Valet Company. We valet at a popular restraunt in Houston called Brennans. I am one of his managers a Brennans I truly enjoy going to work; everyday is different meaning new Faces, Personalities, Great food, my degree is Electrical Engineering of Technology I just got laid off awhile back. I am grateful at have work for now a friend of mine was willing to help me when I needed it. So I hope whoever I help we can become friends to.

lender.name: Aimee
lender.loan_because: Someday all of us need help. When someone asks you, you will do the same for them too! All the best wishes to you and your familes, Aimee
lender.occupational_info: Raising a family.

lender.name: Devin
lender.loan_because: From each according to his ability to loan, to each according to his need for a loan.
lender.occupational_info: I design and animate things for TV and video games.

lender.name: Neyda
lender.occupation: Stay at home mom, wife and real estate investor
lender.loan_because: God Loves Me
lender.occupational_info: We are blessed to stay at home with out son and invest in real estate

lender.name: Yenni
lender.loan_because: To generate money, you need money. It is amazing on how much impact you can do with the little money that you lend out.
lender.occupational_info: I spent all day in front of the computer making sure all the computers working properly.

lender.name: amanda
lender.loan_because: someone gifted us the money....we wanted to go shopping with it. More time was spent thinking and we realized the shopping has not ceased. Now its for people which is a little creepy but we want to take it as far as possible. We aspire to own a similar venture someday. But here in the States. Cant be bothered to leave our SUV or air conditioning. Rock on Kiva!
lender.occupational_info: A study of others art. Research and fact finding about the great artisans past and present. Shooting pictures of my art, which is nature. Babies mostly: labor and delivery in particular.

lender.name: Nicholas
lender.loan_because: it makes me feel all warm and fuzzy!
lender.occupational_info: Creating smiles and enjoyment through my food.

lender.name: Tripper
lender.loan_because: someone's gotta fight the corporations...brah
lender.occupational_info: I'm in school. Education is key.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I loan because I believe in change. We can help those who desire to help themselves, but may have no financial means to do so. This isn't charity, it is empowerment.

lender.name: Ken
lender.loan_because: My boss gave my first loan as a gift, and I am touched by the whole idea.
lender.occupational_info: I help people learn the business of insurance, and the good things it can do for families in their time of need...

lender.name: Gregory Grellet
lender.loan_because: I lend because I care. Because I believe that, as one human being, helping my neighbour or a person several thousands kilometers away, has become more than a possibility. it must become a duty. What would be a world where we would all help each other?
lender.occupational_info: I'm a student in a business School. I learn how to trade, manage, lead a team and work within a company with international perspectives.

lender.name: Jaesoo
lender.loan_because: Jesus will love it.
lender.occupational_info: I love my life and family! Thanks God!

lender.name: Peter & Catherine
lender.loan_because: We believe in the 'Power of One' (or two)

lender.name: Hope
lender.loan_because: It truly is a blessing to be able to help others. It makes me happy to enable others to become independent!

lender.name: Rubi
lender.loan_because: I'm able to.

lender.name: Reed
lender.loan_because: I'm at a place in life where I have a little extra money that I'd like to use to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I protect endangered shorebirds.

lender.name: Cameron & Evelyn
lender.loan_because: God has blessed us in many, many ways and it is now, with humble hearts, our great pleasure to "Pay It Forward." God is good ... all the time!
lender.occupational_info: I help small business owners setup, track and maintain their financial transactions on the computer so they can better manage their business with current, accurate information.

lender.name: Mark
lender.occupational_info: I am pursuing a degree in industrial engineering from Purdue University in Indiana so that one day I can work for the World Food Programme in Africa.

lender.name: tanveer
lender.loan_because: i need
lender.occupational_info: i lobe to do research work

lender.name: The Loeki
lender.loan_because: I strongly believe in the concept of microfinancing and I very much like being in control of my own spending.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a computer nerd. Sans the pizza fingers and with a social life, but otherwise just about as computer nerd as it gets :-)

lender.name: Vik
lender.loan_because: poverty is a disease that needs to be eradicated.

lender.name: brian wallace
lender.loan_because: I like to see loans up and runniing and if I can help by topping up the amount left, thus getting the loan to the recipient sooner, then that works for me.
lender.occupational_info: I have worked with younger Chinese artists in Beijing for 20 years exhibiting and representing many of them throughout their career -seeing their development, (and mine) is most rewarding. Now being able to go beyond this by lending to other communities takes this reward further.

lender.name: Simone
lender.loan_because: Heaven is for everybody, even on earth!
lender.occupational_info: I'm in charge of the money belonging to the company I work for, which is active in trading of metals and minerals for the Aluminium industry and other industries around the world

lender.name: Sonja
lender.loan_because: I want to help others to help themselves The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams. (Eleanor Roosevelt)
lender.occupational_info: I run my own translation business focusing on English and German.

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because:
I ask myself every morning: Is the world better off with or without me?
Sadly, my answer today is still "Without."
I have used up huge amount of resources, done a lot of pollution just to live a "normal" "modern" life.

lender.name: Nat
lender.occupational_info: I run youth Quaker camp.

lender.name: Arjan Droger
lender.loan_because: It is our task to share with our neighbour of the abundance that we have. To encourage them, and giving them a change, to build a better life.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I am student from Indonesia, i like photography very much. But i can have it...
lender.occupational_info: I take human interset picture for my portfolio.

lender.name: Ron
lender.loan_because: I was thrilled to learn of Kiva because earlier in the day I had told my employees about micro-loans to explain the context of a new product we will offer to merchants in LDCs.
lender.occupational_info: Our firm provides instant, easy online shopping carts to web site owners who want to sell from their web sites. Our new product for LDCs will be offered free to LDC merchants who want to reach global markets.

lender.name: Vidar
lender.loan_because: I believe in people helping themselves.

lender.name: yuki
lender.loan_because: people around me helped me a lot, so I really want to help other people too. I think we shouldnt forget that people are sharing one world. I pray for everyone from Japan!

lender.name: Pjotr
lender.loan_because: I believe in the golden rule: "treat others as you would like to be treated."

lender.name: Lucy
lender.loan_because: It's can make world different !!Many people just enjoy shopping .make money ... but soul always feel empty because they are very selfish never understand help people to change thier life is so wonderful thing .

lender.name: Angel
lender.loan_because: I received a Kiva Gift Certificate for my birthday and I am so moved and humbled. Giving is the best gift.
lender.occupational_info: Boring at best!

lender.name: Greta Galeazzi
lender.loan_because:
we MUST help people born in the "wrong" side of the world. It's easy and funny the living for us..good schools, brand new clothes each month, big cars, exotic holidays, discos, credit cards... mum and dad pays all..that's easy living! But don't forget the others!
Those people are poor..but i'm sure "inside" they are richer than us. It's time to SHARE our money with them. It's time to stop wasting money in stupid things. Let's help them! They don't need all our stupid things..They only need some $$ to SURVIVE. Galeazzi Greta
lender.occupational_info: europeAN CITIZEN Greta Galeazzi

lender.name: maria
lender.loan_because: Por causa deles.. Dos da fotografia e dos outros.

lender.name: Graa
lender.loan_because: For 18 years I worked owner of an agency for tourism. With the lack of government investment in small businesses, I was forced to close it. Moved me to a city that is considered the new center of tourism in the south of Brazil. It is a city designed in the form of Rio de Janeiro. Here I have the intention of opening a hostel for receiving tourists from around the world coming to the city. Currently rent only 3 rooms in my own house, but I have the dream of opening a real Hostel.
lender.occupational_info: My job is to receive tourists from around the world coming to Santa Catarina. Not a hotel, but a home of the family that hosts people. The city where live receives every year in the summer about 2 million people and during the entire year receive tourists. In addition to tourists, the city is next to Itaja, a city with a large port and so they also receive a large number of visitors who are hosting in hostels for value more accessible and a more familiar. During the hosting of the tourists do breakfast, lunch and dinner, wash their clothes, and we look at the airport and make of car trips by beaches. With an inn could increase the number of guests, increase the number of employees, buying a caminhoneta for transport to airports and outings.

lender.name: Alan
lender.loan_because: God has blessed my family and myself in countless ways. By loaning what I can I hope to help spread God's word and blessing throughout the world.
lender.occupational_info: I am an Army Civil Affairs Soldier. I am on my second deployment to Iraq and helped, in a small way, to improve the lives of all Iraqis.

lender.name: Jammys Clay
lender.loan_because: Eu quero poder ter a minha escola de informatica, modesta, fazer os meus consertos, mas nao tenho condies, pra iniciar um negcio prprio...
lender.occupational_info: Eu sou tcnico em informatica, desenvolvimento de sistemas, manuteno de micros e perifricos, ministro aulas nessa rea...

lender.name: dina
lender.loan_because: Every little bit makes a difference

lender.name: Daniel & Sabine
lender.loan_because: We lend, because Jesus teaches to help others. God promised to bless those who give back what they've been given. Plus, If the people we help, help others in turn, it will just keep going on forever. Seems like a pretty good plan.

lender.name: scootermonkey
lender.loan_because: I want to help people better themselves and their lives, and the people on Kiva seem to have the self-motivation to become fully independent. I admire this trait and feel motivated myself to help them in their goals.
lender.occupational_info: i develop software for clients.

lender.name: Brian and Heather
lender.loan_because: We have been unable to shake the monetary system
lender.occupational_info: we learn

lender.name: The Crossing
lender.loan_because: We decided to go together as a group & help someone.
lender.occupational_info: We get together each Wednesday night and eat dinner, then spend time sharing what we've learned in our personal study & discussing topics from the Bible.

lender.name: Mother of two...
lender.loan_because: As a former single mom, I have had much struggle in my life...and nearly lost my two precious children (see photo). I want to help others make a better life for their families.

lender.name: tim
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of helping people to lift themselves out of there current situations. these gifts just keep on giving.
lender.occupational_info: I am promoting this site to help more people help in this way

lender.name: jorit
lender.loan_because: the least we can do is give people in other countries the chance to improve their lives and providing funds like this makes people active rather than passive
lender.occupational_info: I travel around the world to maintain a distributor network who sell our products (software for behavioral research). THus I see a lot of poverty right next door to riches

lender.name: Lucy
lender.loan_because: it is a small world and we all need to pay it forward to some degree and try to help each other. We are all God's children.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired from the US Post Office after 24 years, I was a Postmaster in a small rural post office. The population is about 2000 people. We have cold snowy winters and beautiful country summers.

lender.name: Terris grandchildren
lender.loan_because: everyone that can help, should help
lender.occupational_info: 11 grandchildren (ages 2-13) learning how to give back. We give all the glory to God

lender.name: LUXSTONE

Transcription the next semester.

lender.name: Melissa

lender.occupational_info: I truly care and want others to have a home they can call there own- and help with finding home loans that help first time buyers and low income.

lender.name: CU/UWM Econ class
lender.loan_because: We want to be involved in direct financing of an entrepreneur who needs our funds.
lender.occupational_info:
The original funds were donated by a Money and Banking economics class at the University of Wisconsin - Milwaukee. Students in a Money and Banking class at the University of Colorado have added to that amount. As we study financial markets, Kiva provides a perfect opportunity to explore the role of risk and return.
(please note that our participation should not be taken as an endorsement by the University of Wisconsin - Milwaukee or the University of Colorado).

lender.name: Tiffany
lender.loan_because: it makes me feel as if I'm making a difference, to someone, some way.

lender.name: Rachael
lender.loan_because: I think it is important, and I like it because it's not charity. It is a loan from one human being to another, much like I'd loan to a friend.

lender.loan_because: i love it !

lender.name: Sabari
lender.loan_because: I want to give back.

lender.name: Barb
lender.loan_because: God has Blessed me and my family, and it just feels good to help someone less fortunate than ourselves.

lender.loan_because: I find satisfaction in helping people, not just in my own local, but throughout the world.

lender.name: Crist

lender.occupational_info: Develop software for TV and Radio Stations

lender.name: Kindree
lender.loan_because: I like making a tangible, positive difference in someone else's life and I especially like assisting entrepreneurs in bettering their own lives and the lives of their children and their communities. I value and admire the creativity and fortitude that these people are demonstrating by starting and growing their own businesses. I have had a few small businesses of my own, and it is not easy!
lender.occupational_info: I write instructions that help people use our company website. I also work closely with our team to create a better website and improve the experience for the people who visit the website.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: Giving people the tools to make their lives better is something so significant and easy to identify with that I am happy to be a part of this program. I have been helped in so many ways throughout my life. It is essential for me to help others as a manner of sharing.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired but my role as a social worker was as a local government worker. I had many different programs that I worked in during my career. A common theme emerged that was to work with individuals and families towards their becoming self sufficient. This took the form of training, employment, education assistance, as well as a place to live. Social work became my niche. In retirement I try to keep myself involved as a volunteer in helping people.

lender.name: Luciana
lender.loan_because: Small acts can cause big effects in our society
lender.occupational_info: Selling dreams... Trips are experiences that you keep in your mind and heart more than any souvenir you can buy. I have deep pleasure to show the city through my eyes...
